channel.title: Residence Mod, 2 per person
channel.description: because for people with citys and towns... 1 is not big enough.

item.title: Residence Mod, 2 per person
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:24, topic:403343”][quote author=mironic link=topic=500401.msg3661755#msg3661755 date=1310400119]

This residence thing needs some kind of birds eye view outline, or something where the blocks which are residence could maybe be seen if you typed /res (something). It’s hard outlining it because I keep running into the area Agl protected.
[/quote]MITB would have to re program it and maybe make flame apear on the line and disipear so you know where

Through a wood house? brilliant.[/quote]
it would just be an effect lol… you know like lightning fire… where it vanishes instantly.

Read full topic

item.title: Residence Mod, 2 per person
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:19, topic:403343”][quote author=mironic link=topic=500401.msg3661686#msg3661686 date=1310397233]

[quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=500401.msg3661671#msg3661671 date=1310396325]

Yep, that was the plan.
[/quote]also mopar, i have been to fort mopar, and i made a pathway between our portals.

Can you actually get in through my portal? You shouldn’t have been able to, unless someone already in there allowed it.
[/quote]portals are an entry point :3 come on later today and il get in again nice fort btw

They are when they are lit and don’t have lava running down the length of them, which is why I wonder how you got in?

lol XD theres another portal. theres the one inside your tower and one behind it XD nere the torches. :3 i left a sign in your graveyard

Oh yea, I just didn’t think you could get in the one in the tower part, glad you still can’t. :)[/quote]
i get to that part… then i burn… and die xD

Read full topic

item.title: Residence Mod, 2 per person
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:11, topic:403343”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=500401.msg3660770#msg3660770 date=1310345354]
No, Because if it is a town have each town member protect there part of it, As MITB stated. That seems better I mean the space is big enough to hold all the important stuff and big brother is still there to undo griefing.
[/quote]

Yes, BigBrother will still record and undo griefing if it happens, we aren’t removing that.[/quote]Then 1 should be just fine, People will just have to store there chest and important none bigbrother blocks with in the residence.

Read full topic

item.title: Residence Mod, 2 per person
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I voted no as well, I think even having a full 64 x 64 x infinity area is pushing it

Read full topic

item.title: Residence Mod, 2 per person
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I don’t think everything you own should be protected. That isn’t the purpose of this, if it was, everyone would be allowed unlimited protections.

Another reason I’m against 2 is the same reason we just had 1 chest, if you moved locations, it was an actual risk, since you had to remove your protection first and carry your possessions across the wilderness unprotected.

Read full topic

item.title: Residence Mod, 2 per person
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I agree with two.

One isn’t even close to sufficient.

Read full topic
